keyMoments.title: Baby 5 and Buffalo Battle Franky
keyMoments.description: Donquixote Pirates members Baby 5 and Buffalo are sent to retrieve Caesar Clown and engage in battle with Franky's General Franky mech.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's reach and resources even in distant locations.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo's Farewell to Vergo
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo sends a farewell message to Vergo, his longest companion, acknowledging his impending death.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional bonds within the crew despite Doflamingo's ruthlessness.

keyMoments.title: Monet's Sacrifice Order
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo orders Monet to activate Punk Hazard's self-destruct mechanism, accepting her sacrifice for the crew's interests.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the extreme loyalty of crew members and Doflamingo's strategic ruthlessness.

reveals.information: Crew members like Monet and Vergo are willing to die for Doflamingo's plans
Vergo was Doflamingo's longest companion in the crew

keyMoments.title: Franky Defends Against Donquixote Pirates
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his General Franky mech to battle Baby 5 and Buffalo, protecting the crew's escape from Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's coordination in crisis situations with Franky serving as rearguard.

keyMoments.title: Group Gathers for Escape
keyMoments.description: Various Straw Hat members gather in Room R with their allies, preparing to escape the collapsing facility.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to work together and protect allies in dangerous situations.
